00020 /** \file
00021  \brief Dump a single value in a db as height in a KML document
00022  */
00023 
00024 
00025 #include <stdlib.h>
00026 #include <stdio.h>
00027 #include <math.h>
00028 #include <time.h>
00029 
00030 #include "singleheight.h"
00031 
00032 #include "sqlite3.h"
00033 
00034 void kmlvalueheightcolor(sqlite3 *db, FILE *f, const char *name, const char *desc, const char *columnname, int height, const char *col, int numcols, int defaultvis, double start, double end, int trip) {
00035     int rc; // return from sqlite
00036     sqlite3_stmt *stmt; // sqlite statement
00037     const char *dbend; // ignored handle for sqlite
00038 
00039     char select_sql[2048]; // the select statement
00040 
00041     snprintf(select_sql,sizeof(select_sql),
00042                     "SELECT %i*%s/(SELECT MAX(%s) FROM obd "
00043                         "WHERE trip=%i) "
00044                     "AS height,gps.lat, gps.lon, %s "
00045                     "FROM obd INNER JOIN gps ON obd.time=gps.time "
00046                     "WHERE obd.trip=%i",
00047                     height, columnname, columnname, trip, col, trip);
00048 
00049     // printf("select sql:\n%s\n", select_sql);
00050 
00051     rc = sqlite3_prepare_v2(db, select_sql, -1, &stmt, &dbend);
00052 
00053     if(rc != SQLITE_OK) {
00054         printf("SQL Error in valueheightcolor: %i, %s\n", rc, sqlite3_errmsg(db));
00055         printf("SQL: %s\n", select_sql);
00056         return;
00057     } else {
00058 
00059         // First, we have to establish the relevant percentiles
00060         double percentileposition[numcols+1];
00061         percentileposition[0] = 0.001;
00062         int i;
00063         for(i=1;i<=numcols;i++) {
00064             char percentile_sql[2048]; // the actual sql
00065             snprintf(percentile_sql, sizeof(percentile_sql),
00066                 "SELECT %s AS ckobd FROM obd "
00067                 "WHERE vss>0 AND obd.trip=%i "
00068                 "ORDER BY ckobd "
00069                 "LIMIT 1 OFFSET (SELECT %i*COUNT(*)/100 FROM obd "
00070                     "WHERE vss>0 AND obd.trip=%i)",
00071                 col, trip, i*100/numcols, trip);
00072 
00073             // printf("Percentile sql:\n%s\n", percentile_sql);
00074 
00075             sqlite3_stmt *pstmt; // the percentile statement
00076             rc = sqlite3_prepare_v2(db, percentile_sql, -1, &pstmt, &dbend);
00077 
00078             if(rc != SQLITE_OK) {
00079                 printf("SQL Error in valueheightcolor percentile prepare: %i, %s\n", rc, sqlite3_errmsg(db));
00080                 return;
00081             }
00082             sqlite3_step(pstmt);
00083             percentileposition[i] = sqlite3_column_double(pstmt, 0);
00084             sqlite3_finalize(pstmt);
00085         }
00086 
00087         fprintf(f,
00088             "<Document>\n"
00089             "<Style>\n"
00090             "<ListStyle><listItemType>checkHideChildren</listItemType></ListStyle>\n"
00091             "</Style>\n"
00092             "<visibility>%i</visibility>\n"
00093             "<name>%s</name>\n"
00094             "<description>%s</description>\n",defaultvis,name,desc);
00095 
00096         char styleprefix[]="obdgpsStyle";
00097         fprintf(f, "<Style id=\"%s0\">\n"
00098             "<LineStyle>\n"
00099             "<color>00000000</color>\n"
00100             "</LineStyle>\n"
00101             "</Style>\n", styleprefix);
00102 
00103         for(i=1;i<=numcols;i++) {
00104             fprintf(f, "<Style id=\"%s%i\">\n"
00105                 "<PolyStyle>\n"
00106                 "<color>ff00%02x%02x</color>\n"
00107                 "</PolyStyle>\n"
00108                 "<LineStyle>\n"
00109                 "<color>ff00%02x%02x</color>\n"
00110                 "</LineStyle>\n"
00111                 "</Style>\n", styleprefix, i,
00112                 (i-1)*0xFF/(numcols-1),
00113                 0xFF-(i-1)*0xFF/(numcols-1),
00114                 (i-1)*0xFF/(numcols-1),
00115                 0xFF-(i-1)*0xFF/(numcols-1));
00116         }
00117 
00118         int lastpercentile = -1;
00119         double lastpos[3] = {0,0,0};
00120 
00121         int have_firstpos = 0;
00122         double firstpos[3] = {0,0,0};
00123 
00124         char placehead[] = "<Placemark>\n"
00125             "<name>chart</name>\n"
00126             "<styleUrl>#%s%i</styleUrl>\n"
00127             "<LineString>\n"
00128             "<extrude>1</extrude>\n"
00129             "<tessellate>1</tessellate>\n"
00130             "<altitudeMode>relativeToGround</altitudeMode>\n"
00131             "<coordinates>\n"; // At the top of any placemark
00132 
00133         char placetail[] = "</coordinates>\n"
00134             "</LineString>\n"
00135             "</Placemark>\n"; // At the tail of any placemark
00136 
00137         fprintf(f, placehead, styleprefix, 0);
00138 
00139         while(SQLITE_DONE != sqlite3_step(stmt)) {
00140             if(0 == have_firstpos) {
00141                 firstpos[2] = sqlite3_column_double(stmt, 2);
00142                 firstpos[1] = sqlite3_column_double(stmt, 1);
00143                 firstpos[0] = sqlite3_column_double(stmt, 0);
00144                 have_firstpos = 1;
00145             }
00146             double perc = sqlite3_column_double(stmt, 3);
00147             for(i=0;i<numcols;i++) {
00148                 if(percentileposition[i] > perc) break;
00149             }
00150 
00151             // i contains the current percentile
00152             if (lastpercentile != i) {
00153                 if(0 <= lastpercentile) {
00154                     fprintf(f, "%s", placetail);
00155                     fprintf(f, placehead, styleprefix, i);
00156                     fprintf(f, "%f,%f,%f\n", lastpos[2], lastpos[1], lastpos[0]);
00157                 }
00158             }
00159             fprintf(f, "%f,%f,%f\n", sqlite3_column_double(stmt, 2),sqlite3_column_double(stmt, 1),sqlite3_column_double(stmt, 0));
00160             lastpos[2] = sqlite3_column_double(stmt, 2);
00161             lastpos[1] = sqlite3_column_double(stmt, 1);
00162             lastpos[0] = sqlite3_column_double(stmt, 0);
00163 
00164             lastpercentile = i;
00165         }
00166 
00167         fprintf(f, "%s", placetail);
00168 
00169 
00170         // Now print start and end beacons
00171         time_t endt = (time_t)floor(end);
00172         time_t startt = (time_t)floor(start);
00173 
00174         fprintf(f, "<Placemark>\n"
00175             "<name>Start %i (%s)</name>\n"
00176             "<Point>\n"
00177             "<coordinates>\n"
00178             "%f,%f,%f"
00179             "</coordinates>\n"
00180             "</Point>\n"
00181             "</Placemark>\n", trip, ctime(&startt),
00182                 firstpos[2],firstpos[1],firstpos[0]);
00183 
00184         fprintf(f, "<Placemark>\n"
00185             "<name>End %i (%s)</name>\n"
00186             "<Point>\n"
00187             "<coordinates>\n"
00188             "%f,%f,%f"
00189             "</coordinates>\n"
00190             "</Point>\n"
00191             "</Placemark>\n", trip, ctime(&endt),
00192                 lastpos[2],lastpos[1],lastpos[0]);
00193 
00194         fprintf(f,"</Document>\n");
00195     }
00196 
00197     sqlite3_finalize(stmt);
00198 
00199 }
